sections.title: Linkedin Real Time
sections.text: A Subjective data source for linkedin real time.
list: Output: Emits a real-time stream of events/items for downstream subscribers.

sections.title: Typical workflow
sections.intro: Configure Linkedin Real Time with the connection fields and run it as part of a BrainBoost pipeline.

cards.title: Connect
cards.text: Provide brainboost_cookie_linkedin_li_at, brainboost_cookie_linkedin_jsession in the connection form.

cards.title: Fetch
cards.text: Run `fetch()` to ingest, transform, or stream data.

cards.title: Consume
cards.text: Use the emitted items in downstream indexing, search, or automation steps.

items.q: What do I need to configure?
items.a: At minimum: brainboost_cookie_linkedin_li_at, brainboost_cookie_linkedin_jsession. Additional fields may be optional depending on your use case.
Emits a real-time stream of events/items for downstream subscribers.
Outputs are emitted to downstream subscribers in the BrainBoost pipeline. Some datasources also write artifacts (context files, catalogs, or exports) locally based on your configuration.

sections.title: Ready to use Linkedin Real Time?
sections.text: Add it to your BrainBoost pipeline and start ingesting.
sections.subtext: Run this datasource locally with your own credentials and storage.
